channel.title: Changing Coordinates
channel.description: Hi i have a chaos altar that my friend inserted and im wondering where would i find the coordinates to change it?

item.title: Changing Coordinates
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“DannyBoy1995, post:4, topic:392063”][quote author=wildskiller link=topic=489225.msg3576753#msg3576753 date=1303485647]
Try and find object handler and object manager the object should be 6552, ****, ****
the * for coordinates see if you can change them but dont change the object number
[/quote]
i changed the coordinates at the end but it didnt work any other places it might be where i change it?[/quote]

to get new coordinates you need to use the following in objectmanager.java ( do note this is for pi)

[code]

c.getPA().showObjectSpawn(itemid, xcoord, ycoord, direction, 10);//commentgoeshereifyouwish[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Coordinates

item.description:

the * for coordinates see if you can change them but dont change the object number[/quote]
i changed the coordinates at the end but it didnt work any other places it might be where i change it?

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Coordinates
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

If you stand by the altar you can try a command like ::mypos and get similar coords.

Read full topic
